mapper.select: SELECT e.*, s.student_number, s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_code, c.course_name, cs.section_code, i.first_name as instructor_first_name, i.last_name as instructor_last_name FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN coursesection cs ON e.section_id = cs.section_id JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id JOIN instructor i ON cs.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE e.enrollment_id = #{enrollmentId}

SELECT e.enrollment_id, e.student_id, e.section_id, e.semester_id, e.enrollment_status, e.numeric_grade, e.letter_grade, e.grade_points, e.enrolled_at, e.updated_at, s.student_number, s.first_name AS student_first_name, s.last_name AS student_last_name, cs.section_id AS cs_section_id, cs.section_code, c.course_code, c.course_name, c.credits, i.first_name AS instructor_first_name, i.last_name AS instructor_last_name FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN coursesection cs ON e.section_id = cs.section_id JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id JOIN instructor i ON cs.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE e.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT e.*, s.student_number, s.first_name, s.last_name, c.course_code, c.course_name, cs.section_code, i.first_name as instructor_first_name, i.last_name as instructor_last_name FROM enrollment e JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN coursesection cs ON e.section_id = cs.section_id JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id JOIN instructor i ON cs.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE e.section_id = #{sectionId}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_A, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 85 AND numeric_grade < 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_A_minus, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 82 AND numeric_grade < 85 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_B_plus, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 78 AND numeric_grade < 82 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_B, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 75 AND numeric_grade < 78 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_B_minus, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 72 AND numeric_grade < 75 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_C_plus, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 68 AND numeric_grade < 72 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_C, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 64 AND numeric_grade < 68 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_C_minus, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 60 AND numeric_grade < 64 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_D, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade < 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as grade_F FROM enrollment e JOIN coursesection cs ON e.section_id = cs.section_id WHERE cs.course_id = #{courseId} AND e.numeric_grade IS NOT NULL

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as score_90_100, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 80 AND numeric_grade < 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as score_80_89, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 70 AND numeric_grade < 80 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as score_70_79, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade >= 60 AND numeric_grade < 70 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as score_60_69, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN numeric_grade < 60 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) as score_0_59 FROM enrollment e JOIN coursesection cs ON e.section_id = cs.section_id WHERE cs.course_id = #{courseId} AND e.numeric_grade IS NOT NULL

SELECT e.enrollment_id, cs.section_id, cs.section_code, c.course_name, s.student_id AS studentId, s.student_number AS studentNumber, s.first_name AS studentFirstName, s.last_name AS studentLastName, i.instructor_id AS instructorId, i.first_name AS instructorFirstName, i.last_name AS instructorLastName FROM enrollment e LEFT JOIN coursesection cs ON e.section_id = cs.section_id LEFT JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN student s ON e.student_id = s.student_id LEFT JOIN instructor i ON cs.instructor_id = i.instructor_id WHERE cs.section_id = #{sectionId}
